summary:
There's quite a few here, but there's something for everyone on the Nexus.
-Added unenchanted versions
descriptionHtml:
Playing around with a mage recently... You know, the drama, the magicks, and the robes and I thought, why doesn't the archmage robes have a removable hood?

So I wanted to fix that and that's what I did.

The hood and robes can be equipped separately now. No more one robe or another.

[size=4][u][i][b]BUT WAIT![/b][/i][/u][/size][i][size=4] [/size]    There's mer!      [/i][size=1](elf joke)[/size]

I also tweaked around the stats:

[list]
[*][size=4]Archmage's Robes - Same as Vanilla; 15% Spell cost reduction and 100% Magicka Regen[/size]
[*][size=4]Archmage's Hood* - "Same" as Vanilla; 15% Spell cost reduction, 100% Magicka Regen, AND 50 magicka bonus![/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=4]Archmage's Boots - Went from Resist 15% shock to [u]Resist 22% Magic[/u]![/size]
[/list][size=3]
*[i]Just a hood now, no robes, but still has robe enchantment and it stacks with robe. Be a truly magical Archmage!

Stick around fellas for I have a [size=4][u][b]SPECIAL OFFER[/b][/u][/size][/i]!

An [u][i]optional file[/i][/u] for... [size=1][i]those[/i][/size] people.

Female Archmage robes replaced with the Nocturnal Robes and New Hood.
Same tweaks
Same buff
More [i]Spice...[/i]

[u][b]Compatibility:[/b][/u] Anything that changes the Stats of the Archmage robes should conflict. Mesh and texture replacers should work fine
If using the optional file, any mesh and texture replacers will be overwritten by this file.

Also, the Optional file does replace the texture for the Nocturnal Robes. It's a lazy retexture, be warned. It's not too bad, but it ain't fancy.

[u][b]UPDATE:
[/b][/u][/size][list]
[*][size=3]Added Unenchanted robes located under the Archmage's bed. Replace the main .esp please. Optional is required for replacer version.[/size]

[/list]
author: TheNerevar
